title: Drawing, "Radio City Music Hall: Roxy Apartment, Living Room Elevation", 1932
medium: Graphite and blue colored pencil on tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with descriptions and materials
description: Elevations for living room of Roxy Apartment. Elevation at upper center shows two narrow windows near left with table and upholstered armchair at center. Sideboard and mirror (?) at right, and door at far right. Low, reclined upholstered armchair and sideboard at far left. Elevation at upper right shows fireplace at center with mirror above; figural sculpture on mantel. Upholstered arm chair, end table, and lamp at left; door at right. Fireplace in ebonized maple with cast iron back. Elevation at lower left shows long table at center with two lamps at each end; piano, bench, and lamp at right, sideboard (?) at left. Rough sketches in margins.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Radio City Music Hall: Roxy Apartment, Living Room Elevation", 1932.
1932. Graphite and blue colored pencil on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-471.
